scale.1: Exploring/Beginners. Just exploring programming or experimenting.
scale.2: Learning/Academic Tasks. To complete tasks for educational purposes. Such as passing tests or assignments.
scale.3: Hobby/Personal Projects. For fun or personal interest.
scale.4: Work/Professional. As part of my job or for professional projects.
